name: Pylife
description:
Pylife is my own version of Game of Life, except it is more depressing. It is based on a board game i made in the past. It is written entirely by me in Python 3. Note: since this game is in development, once you hit eighth grade you will have to repeat eighth grade or restart the game. I am looking for feedback, experiences, or feature ideas, please comment below
Current Features:

  • Random Events
  • Disabilities and Advantages
  • Diseases
